description: This file provides a set of services for interacting with a Supabase backend, specifically for managing user ratings, lists, and optional progress tracking in a manga and anime tracking application. It includes functions for loading, adding, updating, and removing data related to user interactions with media items.

methods.name: loadAll
methods.description: Loads all ratings for the current user, returning a map of media_id to rating.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Inserts or updates a rating for a media item, including user ID and media details.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a rating for a specific media item.

methods.name: loadList
methods.description: Loads a specific list of media items by list name for the current user.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a media item to a specified list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a media item from a specified list.

methods.name: isAvailable
methods.description: Checks if the progress feature is enabled and the related table exists.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the last progress record for a media item.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Updates or inserts progress data for a media item.
